title: Our Services
subtitle: Comprehensive IT solutions for your business

services.name: Windows & Software Update Management
services.shortDescription: Automatic patching and performance monitoring that stops issues before they start.
services.heroSubtitle: Keep your systems secure and running smoothly with automated patching and proactive monitoring
services.description: Outdated software is one of the biggest security vulnerabilities for any business. Our update management service ensures all your Windows systems and applications are always running the latest, most secure versions — without disrupting your team's work.

features.title: Automated Patching
features.description: Security and feature updates applied automatically during off-hours to minimize disruption

features.title: Performance Monitoring
features.description: Real-time tracking of system health, CPU, memory, and disk usage across all endpoints

features.title: Third-Party Updates
features.description: Not just Windows — we keep browsers, Adobe, Java, and other critical software current

features.title: Patch Testing
features.description: Updates tested before deployment to prevent compatibility issues

benefits: Reduce security vulnerabilities by up to 85%
Minimize system downtime from outdated software
Free your team from manual update tasks
Comprehensive reporting on patch compliance

services.name: Antivirus & Endpoint Detection & Response
services.shortDescription: Always-on threat protection with rapid containment of suspicious activity.
services.heroSubtitle: Enterprise-grade protection that stops threats before they spread across your network
services.description: Traditional antivirus isn't enough anymore. Our EDR solution combines advanced threat detection with rapid response capabilities, isolating compromised devices instantly and giving you visibility into exactly what's happening across your network.

features.title: Real-Time Threat Detection
features.description: AI-powered analysis identifies malware, ransomware, and zero-day threats as they emerge

features.title: Automated Containment
features.description: Suspicious devices are instantly isolated to prevent lateral movement

features.title: Behavioral Analysis
features.description: Detects unusual patterns that signature-based tools miss

features.title: Forensic Investigation
features.description: Detailed logs and timelines help understand how incidents occurred

benefits: Stop ransomware before files are encrypted
Reduce incident response time from hours to seconds
Gain visibility into all endpoint activity
Meet compliance requirements for endpoint security

services.name: Data Backup & Recovery
services.shortDescription: Local and cloud backups designed for reliability, tested regularly to guarantee recovery.
services.heroSubtitle: Never lose critical business data with our multi-layered backup strategy
services.description: Data loss can happen in seconds — from ransomware, hardware failure, or human error. Our backup solutions protect your business with multiple redundant copies, regular testing, and the ability to restore operations quickly when disaster strikes.

features.title: Hybrid Backup Strategy
features.description: Local backups for fast recovery plus cloud replication for disaster protection

features.title: Continuous Protection
features.description: Incremental backups capture changes throughout the day, not just overnight

features.title: Regular Test Restores
features.description: We verify your backups work — not just that they exist

features.title: Rapid Recovery
features.description: Granular restoration options from single files to full systems

benefits: Recover from ransomware without paying
Meet insurance and compliance backup requirements
Minimize downtime with fast restoration
Peace of mind with verified, tested backups

services.name: Email Spam Filtering
services.shortDescription: Advanced filtering to block phishing, malware, and spam before it hits your inbox.
services.heroSubtitle: Keep malicious emails out of your inbox with enterprise-grade filtering
services.description: Email remains the primary attack vector for cybercriminals. Our advanced filtering catches phishing attempts, malware attachments, and business email compromise before they reach your users — protecting your business from the threats that traditional spam filters miss.

features.title: Advanced Phishing Detection
features.description: AI-powered analysis catches sophisticated spear-phishing and impersonation attacks

features.title: Attachment Sandboxing
features.description: Suspicious files are detonated safely to detect hidden malware

features.title: Link Protection
features.description: URLs are scanned in real-time to block malicious websites

features.title: Outbound Filtering
features.description: Prevent data leaks and protect your domain reputation

benefits: Block 99.9% of spam and phishing emails
Protect against ransomware delivered via email
Reduce time staff spend dealing with junk mail
Prevent business email compromise attacks

services.name: Security Awareness Training
services.shortDescription: Engaging cybersecurity training, including phishing simulations and learning portal.
services.heroSubtitle: Transform your employees from security risk to your first line of defense
services.description: Your employees are either your greatest security vulnerability or your strongest defense. Our training program turns staff into security-aware team members who can spot phishing attempts, handle data safely, and respond correctly to potential threats.

features.title: Phishing Simulations
features.description: Regular simulated attacks test and reinforce employee awareness

features.title: Interactive Learning
features.description: Engaging online modules covering essential security topics

features.title: Progress Tracking
features.description: Monitor completion rates and identify employees who need additional support

features.title: Compliance Reporting
features.description: Documentation to demonstrate security training for audits and insurance

benefits: Reduce successful phishing attacks by up to 90%
Meet compliance training requirements
Build a security-conscious company culture
Identify high-risk employees for targeted training

services.name: Identity Threat & Dark Web Monitoring
services.shortDescription: Instant alerts if your business credentials appear online.
services.heroSubtitle: Know immediately when your credentials are compromised — before criminals act
services.description: Stolen credentials are sold on the dark web every day. Our monitoring service continuously scans underground markets and data dumps for your company's email addresses, passwords, and sensitive data — alerting you instantly so you can act before attackers do.

features.title: Continuous Scanning
features.description: 24/7 monitoring of dark web forums, marketplaces, and data dumps

features.title: Instant Alerts
features.description: Immediate notification when your credentials appear online

features.title: Domain Monitoring
features.description: Track all email addresses associated with your business domain

features.title: Remediation Guidance
features.description: Clear steps to secure compromised accounts

benefits: Discover breaches before they're exploited
Protect against credential stuffing attacks
Demonstrate due diligence for compliance
Reduce risk of account takeover
